commitVote(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint2.details: Commit Phase: Submit vote commitment with ZK proof The ZK proof verifies: 1. Token Verification: noteHash reconstructed from components 2. Snapshot Inclusion: merkle proof of token ownership 3. Ownership Proof: secret key derives public key 4. Power Consistency: declared power matches note value 5. Choice Validation: vote is 0, 1, or 2 6. Commitment Creation: commitment = hash(choice, voteSalt, proposalId)

createProposal(string,string,uint256,uin.details: Create a new proposal with associated merkle root snapshot

params._merkleRoot: Snapshot of token holders merkle root
params._revealDuration: Duration of reveal phase in seconds
params._votingDuration: Duration of commit phase in seconds

deleteProposal(uint256).details: Delete a proposal (only proposer, only if no votes)

getProposalVoterSnapshot(uint256).details: Get voter snapshot for a specific proposal

getRegisteredVoters().details: Get all registered voter note hashes

getVoterCount().details: Get the number of registered voters

isMerkleRootValid(uint256).details: Check if merkle root is valid

isNullifierUsed(uint256,uint256).details: Check if nullifier has been used

registerMerkleRoot(uint256).details: Register a merkle root snapshot for token eligibility

params._merkleRoot: The root of the token ownership merkle tree

registerVoter(uint256).details: Register a voter's note hash to the shared registry

params._noteHash: The hash of the voter's token note

revealVote(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint2.details: Reveal Phase: Reveal vote choice and salt After commit phase ends, voters reveal their choices. The contract verifies the reveal matches the commitment. Per D1 spec: commitment = hash(choice, votingPower, proposalId, voteSalt)

updateProposalVoters(uint256,uint256).details: [DEMO ONLY] Update proposal to include all current registered voters

params._newMerkleRoot: The new merkle root computed from all registered voters
